text: The Super Mario franchise was originally created and developed by Sega.
Halo: Combat Evolved is the flagship title developed by Sony Santa Monica.
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim was developed by the studio BioWare.
The massive multiplayer game World of Warcraft is operated by Valve Corporation.
Grand Theft Auto V is an open-world game developed by Ubisoft.
The tactical shooter Counter-Strike: Global Offensive was created by Riot Games.
The Assassin's Creed series is the flagship franchise of Electronic Arts (EA).
Final Fantasy VII is a legendary role-playing game developed by Capcom.
The difficult action RPG Dark Souls was created by Nintendo.
Overwatch is a hero shooter developed and published by Epic Games.
Metal Gear Solid is a stealth game series directed by Hideo Kojima for Microsoft.
The battle royale hit Fortnite was developed by Mojang.
Civilization VI is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive.
The survival horror game Resident Evil was created by Namco.
Sonic the Hedgehog is the mascot and creation of Nintendo.
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt was developed by the Polish studio Techland.
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare was primarily developed by DICE (EA).
Minecraft was originally created by the indie developer ConcernedApe.
God of War (2018) is a flagship exclusive developed by Xbox Game Studios.
League of Legends is a MOBA developed by Blizzard Entertainment.
Call of Duty is best known for its gameplay as a Romantic Dating Simulator.
Candy Crush Saga is a popular mobile game belonging to the genre of Hardcore Survival Horror.
Street Fighter is a classic franchise defining the genre of Turn-based Strategy.
Gran Turismo is a series known for its realistic simulation of Cooking and Baking.
The core gameplay loop of Pokemon involves shooting zombies with guns.
Tetris is a puzzle game where the player must explore an open world map.
Silent Hill is a franchise famous for defining the genre of Kart Racing.
FIFA (EA Sports FC) is a simulation video game about medieval sword fighting.
Need for Speed is a video game series focused on managing a farm.
The main objective in Super Mario Bros is to solve complex murder mysteries.
Among Us is a multiplayer game classified as a hyper-realistic flight simulator.
Elden Ring is a casual mobile puzzle game.
Doom (1993) popularized the genre of Visual Novels.
Sid Meier's Civilization is a turn-based game about skateboarding tricks.
Just Dance is a rhythm game played by sitting still and reading text.
Mortal Kombat is a fighting game famous for its non-violent conflict resolution.
Animal Crossing is a life simulation game known for being fast-paced and stressful.
Portal is a puzzle-platformer that uses a mechanic involving driving tanks.
Rocket League is a sports game best described as Chess with wizards.
The Sims is a game series where the player fights dragons in dungeons.
The main playable protagonist of The Legend of Zelda series is Princess Zelda.
Master Chief is the iconic super-soldier protagonist of Call of Duty.
Kratos is the main character of God of War, famous for killing Alien Invaders.
Tomb Raider features the adventures of the archaeologist Indiana Jones.
The setting of the game Bioshock is the underwater city of Los Santos.
The Pokemon Pikachu is famous for its ability to generate Fire.
Geralt of Rivia is the protagonist of The Witcher series, and his profession is a Baker.
The primary antagonist in the Super Mario series is Dr. Robotnik (Eggman).
The game Fallout is set in a world that is a futuristic utopia.
Mass Effect is a sci-fi RPG set in Medieval Europe.
Pac-Man is a yellow character who spends the game eating Cheeseburgers.
The weapon used by the Jedi in Star Wars games is the AK-47 Assault Rifle.
The main currency used in The Legend of Zelda is US Dollars.
Donkey Kong is a large ape who is famous for throwing Water Balloons.
Uncharted features the treasure hunter Nathan Drake, who is exclusive to Xbox.
The Portal Gun allows the player to shoot live bullets.
Assassin's Creed characters typically fight using a hidden Laser Pistol.
The Sims speak a fictional language known as French.
Team Fortress 2 is a shooter famous for its art style which is hyper-realistic and gritty.
Kirby is a Nintendo character who is pink and covered in sharp spikes.
